title.narrative: Strengthening Peace, Democracy and Freedom of Expression in South Sudan

description.narrative: Widening democratic space requires commitment from both government and citizens. However, the ongoing conflict in South Sudan has weakened already fragile state institutions, affecting the government’s ability to protect civilians and offer basic services. The administration of justice has further deteriorated, with an increase in arbitrary arrests as well as prolonged pre-trial and incommunicado detentions of journalists without charge. The space for freedom of expression has severely narrowed as security organs have clamped down on the media, shutting down media outlets and threatening journalists and human rights defenders. Additionally, due to fear of prosecution and harassment, citizens rarely assert their right to freedom of speech. The signing of the ARCISS provides an opportunity for the media to disseminate information on the peace agreement and its implementation, widening the space for freedom of expression and democracy. The project reflects UK government priorities to ensure greater protection of freedom of expression for journalists and civil society in South Sudan, which are fundamental platforms for or democratisation processes . The project will provide a platform to enable citizens to engage in a more strategic way with national issues, particularly the peace agreement and its implementation processes (e.g. Chapter 5 of the ARCISS[I]). The project will build on the work of an earlier project that was funded through CSSF-FCO on ‘Enhanced Press Freedom: Foundation for Good Governance’. The proposed project will improve the knowledge of journalists on the peace agreement and its implementation, providing a platform for citizens to discuss the ARCISS and its implementation. It aims to create an enabling environment for journalists and citizens to express themselves freely. The pro-ject will continue working with radio panel discussions, chat shows, and dialogues that will focus on freedom of expression
